name: Roots Run Deep
description:
Nature fundamentally exists for both the living and the dead. All kinds of species, climate, weather– everything determines our survival However, nature is but just a double-edged sword. Nothing is free from its harm. Confused, Puli woke up in an unknown place. It was dark and they couldn’t see anything. It wasn’t long until a ray of light shines from afar. They then walked towards it. The closer they got, the brighter it became. They got out and before they realized, they found themself in the middle of a forest.

You are Puli, a lost child of nature who seeks for the truth about themself and the world. Help them traverse through the world using the root power, but beware that every great power comes great responsibility.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2023

By:

- Farhan Ramadhani Irsyad (Programmer & Artist)

- Dimas Iqbal Fahreza (Game Designer & Sound Artist)

- Muhammad Abbyu Juniansyah (Level Designer)

- Rizki Taufiq Ramadan (Level Designer)
